name: USG
description:
USG is a top-down, roguelike shooter about a dual-wielding, dimension hopping assassin in search of something mysterious. Kill creatures, upgrade yourself and your weapons, and survive as long as you can without dying. Although death is not necessarily the end...

Features

  • 3 distinct zones
  • 5 bosses
  • 15 different enemies
  • 63 offensive weapons
  • 15 defensive skills (tacticals)
  • over 40 different upgrades

Controls

  • WASD - movement
  • LMB - Primary fire
  • RMB - Secondary fire
  • Space - Tactical
  • Mouse scroll - swap weapons
  • E - Interact
  • F/Q - Kick - guaranteed HP drop!

Whats next?
Here's a list of things we'd like to do if there is interest in this game.

  • Art overhaul! - all art assets are currently placeholder and are intended to be replaced
  • More zones and bosses
  • More aspects (21 weapons and 5 tacticals for each added aspect!)
  • More synergies
  • More shop item upgrades
  • More NPCs
  • More elder shrines
